Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Bristol Park Benidorm, you'll be centrally located in Benidorm, steps from Benidorm City Hall and minutes from Placa del Castell. This hotel is within close proximity of Mediterranean Balcony and Malpas Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 89 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Bristol Park Benidorm, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Bristol Park Benidorm, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Benidorm City Hall - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Placa del Castell - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Mediterranean Balcony - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Malpas Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Estadio Municipal Guillermo Amor - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Casino Mediterraneo Benidorm - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Club de Golf Las Rejas - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Benidorm Palace - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Cala del Tio Ximo Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Villaitana Golf Course - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Aqualandia - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Cavall Peak and Morales Tower - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Mundomar - 3.1 km / 2 mi
La Cala Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Terra Mitica - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Bristol Park Benidorm is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 46.6 km / 29 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
